Your privacy is important to us. Secure Wipe is a fully offline application.

- We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal information.
- We do not monitor your usage of the application.
- All operations, including the device wipe, are performed locally on your device and are initiated solely by you.

This policy is effective as of September 18, 2025.

Disclaimer: This is a sample privacy policy and does not constitute legal advice.
